gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 109, Bulls 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Bulls, 109-91. Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Cavaliers with 34 points (4-10 3PT FG) and 7 assists, while Caris LeVert (16 points, 7 rebounds, 7 assists, 4 3PM) and Sam Merrill (15 points, 4 3PM) added a combined 31 points in the victory. Coby White tallied a team-high 18 points, along with 4 rebounds and 3 assists for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Cavaliers win their fifth straight game as they improve to 23-15 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 19-23.
